examples.example: 在繁忙的街道上，行人都井然有序地走着。

translate.english: On the busy street, pedestrians are walking in an orderly manner.

examples.example: 那位热心的行人帮助老人捡起了掉落的物品。

translate.english: That warm-hearted pedestrian helped the old man pick up the dropped items.

examples.example: 善良的行人给迷路的孩子指引了正确的方向。

translate.english: The kind pedestrian guided the lost child in the right direction.
